subject: Nutrition
title: Blockchain and Food Tracing
description: Learn Blockchain and Food Tracing in one minute.

hook.text: When E. coli strikes, tracing contaminated lettuce takes weeks. Blockchain cuts that to seconds.

buildup.text: Blockchain creates an unalterable digital record tracking food from farm to fork in real time.

discovery.text: Walmart traces mangoes from shelf to farm in 2.2 seconds using blockchainâ€”down from 7 days.

twist.text: The technology exists but adoption lags. Small farmers can't afford the tracking systems retailers demand.

climax.text: Blockchain won't prevent contamination, but it contains outbreaks faster and saves lives when they happen.

punchline.text: Tracking food from farm to fork now takes seconds.

quiz.question: How fast can Walmart now trace mangoes to their farm?
